entry.title: Current Conditions: 12.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: La Scie 3:30 PM NDT Sunday 08 May 2016

Humidity: 95 %

Wind: S 11 km/h

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of rain or drizzle. Low 8.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or drizzle ending overnight then partly cloudy. Fog patches developing this evening. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Low 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Sunday 08 May 2016

entry.title: Monday: A few showers. High 15.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few showers beginning in the morning and ending in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High 15. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Sunday 08 May 2016

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy overnight with 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Sunday 08 May 2016
